title: [Tricks and Quarrels]
description: Pale moonlight sifts in through the windows set high on the stone walls, giving this otherwise austere room a chilly countenance.  Heavy iron sconces bearing brightly flickering candles encircle the space, standing sentinel to the wares on display.  An arrow stand sits beneath one fixture, and a colorful arrow display rests against the opposite wall.  Between a pair of the sconces is a wall-mounted arrow rack, and a small gilt-framed sign hangs from its lowest rung.

Warm light falls in through the windows set high on the stone walls, giving this otherwise austere room an inviting countenance.  Heavy iron sconces bearing unlit candles encircle the space, standing sentinel to the wares on display.  An arrow stand sits beneath one fixture, and a colorful arrow display rests against the opposite wall.  Between a pair of the sconces is a wall-mounted arrow rack, and a small gilt-framed sign hangs from its lowest rung.
